original_title: Bryan Kohberger seeks prison transfer amid sexual assault threats | Fox News
article_summary: Bryan Kohberger, convicted of killing four University of Idaho students, is requesting a transfer from his current prison wing due to alleged threats and harassment from other inmates. Kohberger, known for his social awkwardness, is reportedly facing minute-by-minute verbal threats and has asked to be moved to a quieter wing called B Block. Prison officials have not yet responded to the request.</s>
